Title: Cold Steel
Writer: Gerry Conway (based on the Marvel comics by), John Romita Sr. (based on the Marvel comics by), Ross Andru (based on the Marvel comics by), Steve Lightfoot (created by), Felicia D. Henderson, Angela LaManna (story editor), Ken Kristensen (staff writer)
Actors: Jon Bernthal, Ebon Moss-Bachrach, Ben Barnes, Amber Rose Revah
Plot: Russo opens up to Madani about his past, Sarah shares her concerns about her son with Frank, and a decoy operation takes a turn.
